form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE, Form Number: A2 296 599

full_text: UNITED STATES ARABEL Immigration and Naturalization Service MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE Place BOSTON MA File No. A21 296 599 Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: SEX DATE OF BIRTH Name M 10-12-15 Street Trieu Thuan HUYNH PLACE OF BIRTH Address 37 Moody Drive City.
